channel.title: Npc talk help!

item.title: Npc talk help!
item.dc:creator: @santa_p_hat santa p hat
item.description:
@santa_p_hat wrote:

Okay i would like to put this code in npc.handler it looks alright to me but doesn’t work :’(

Source:Allstar-scape 317

Here’s the code

} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 659) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) // this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Blazingshock")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Server owner/coder Blazingshock is online! :[)"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Server owner/coder Blazingshock is offline :'("; } } }

When i’m online it says i am not… Any help?

Read full topic
